c8d472a5-49c3-49b4-b182-9f5817c6ddfb:
A green ray springs from your hand. You must make a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g} to hit the target. Any creature or object struck by the ray is covered with a shimmering emerald field that completely blocks extradimensional travel. Forms of movement barred by a dimensional anchor include blink, {g|SpellsDimensionDoor}dimension door{/g}, walk through space, teleport, and similar {g|Encyclopedia:Special_Abilities}spell-like abilities{/g}.
A dimensional anchor does not interfere with the movement of creatures already in ethereal or astral form when the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} is cast, nor does it block extradimensional perception or {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} forms. Also, dimensional anchor does not prevent summoned creatures from disappearing at the end of a summoning spell.
d91ed0bd-66be-409d-b7e6-d707a5ab6c31: Ice encrusts the ground, radiating supernatural cold and making it hard for creatures to maintain their balance. This icy ground is treated as difficult terrain. When the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} is cast and every {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} after that, creatures in the area must make a successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} or fall {g|ConditionProne}prone{/g}. Creatures in the area take {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}cold damage{/g} each round and suffer a -2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on saving throws against spells with the cold {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Descriptor}descriptor{/g} until they leave the area.
75d4723c-ed35-440a-bb8d-f04f6b4098de: The bones of your targets' joints grow thick and sharp, protruding painfully through the skin at the knuckles, elbows, shoulders, spine, and knees. The targets each gain a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to natural armor and a +2 bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} with {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural weapons{/g}, and they deal an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}piercing damage{/g} on successful grapple {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g}.
dd0616bc-a2a6-4a80-b0a9-a84d5e25f2ea: This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} functions as {g|SpellsEntangle}entangle{/g}, except it sets the foliage on fire. A creature that begins its turn {g|ConditionEntangled}entangled{/g} by the spell takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}4d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g} (a successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} halves this {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}), and a creature that begins its turn in the area but is not entangled takes 2d6 points of fire damage (a successful Reflex save negates this damage). Smoke rising from the vines partially obscures visibility. {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}Attacks{/g} made in the smoke or against anything in the smoke must contend with {g|Encyclopedia:Concealment}concealment{/g} (20% miss chance). When the spell's duration expires, the vines burn away entirely.
3faaa4bc-0692-49a5-aa18-cec96d891c82: This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} functions as {g|SpellsEntangle}entangle{/g}, except the plants latch on to targets and drain away their vitality. Any creature that fails a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}save{/g} to avoid becoming {g|ConditionEntangled}entangled{/g} or fails a {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} to break free takes 1d2 points of {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}damage{/g}.
21213cda-42ea-4a6f-a42f-db71be2783b9: You call forth a burst of decay that ravages all creatures in the area. Even non-living creatures such as constructs and undead crumble or wither in this malignant eruption of rotting energy. Creatures in the area of effect take {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} (maximum 15d6) and are {g|ConditionStaggered}staggered{/g} for 1d4 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}. A target that succeeds at a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex saving throw{/g} takes half damage and negates the staggered effect. Plant creatures are particularly susceptible to this rotting effect; a plant creature caught in the burst suffers a -2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on the saving throw and takes 1 extra point of damage per die.
d4867d72-e619-424e-9bb1-6d02d2a98995: You create an onrushing surge of water 10 feet high in either a 30-foot cone or a 60-foot line that deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d10{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning damage{/g} for every 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g} you have (maximum 10d10 at 20th level). In addition to taking {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}, creatures that fail their {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex saves{/g} are pushed 1d4×5 feet away from you and are knocked {g|ConditionProne}prone{/g}. Magical effects with fire {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Descriptor}descriptor{/g} on targets in the area of a tidal surge and similar area effects in the selected point are affected as if you had cast {g|SpellsDispelMagic}dispel magic{/g}.
a627e11d-8965-4ba4-bbeb-bacd8c400e75: You imbue the target with an exaggerated sense of its own mortality and a drive for self-preservation. The target is {g|ConditionShaken}shaken{/g}, and the first time each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} the target takes {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} (including the first round of the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}'s duration), it must succeed at another {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} or its fear level increases by one step (from shaken to {g|ConditionFrightened}frightened{/g}). If the target fails a saving throw against this effect while frightened, it is transfixed in terror and is {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}unconscious{/g} for the remainder of the spell's duration. If the target succeeds at the initial Will save, it is shaken for 1 round but its fear level cannot be further increased by this spell's effects during that round.
939a1b14-1556-4537-a97c-e1cd95ffc188: You mimic tugging at the Green Mother's legendary Tangled Knot to subtly alter your fate. The next single {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} made against you takes a -10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. If that attack is a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g}, it is instead treated as a normal hit.
